message: ...Huh?
There are feet in front of me, moving around in the darkness.
Am I...
...am I on the floor?

name: 蓮
message: "Aoba, are you alright?"
I hear Ren's voice through the grating music.
All the noise feels like it's blaring at the same volume. My cheek is on the floor, transmitting the bass directly into my head.
The pulse rocks my brain, and the shrill melody tears through my thoughts like the sound of a dentist's drill.
Splashes of red and pink light scatter across the floor. I hear heavy breathing, but it feels like part of the music.
Red light. Pink light.
Moans. Bass. Shrill cries.
It just keeps repeating, over and over...
...violating my mind and soaking my vision with the blood rushing through my head.
Over and over, over and over...
It's inside me...
Penetrating me...
Penetrating my body...
Something smacks against my cheek. I open my eyes.
I see Mink's face, dyed red and pink by the lights.
...My head is killing me.

name: ミンク
message: "Get up."
Mink grabs my arm and pulls me to my feet.
But my legs are like jello. I can't stand. The floor might as well be a sponge.

name: ミンク
message: "Tch. What's wrong with you? On your feet."
Wrapping his arm around my torso, he finally gets me up off the floor.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...My medicine."

name: ミンク
message: "Ah?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "I just... took my meds... but they're not working... My head..."

name: ミンク
message: "...Start walking."
Mink tries to pull me forward.
My legs aren't really cooperating, though, so he has to drag me, feet sliding along the floor.
Sliiiiiiiiding along.
Sliiiiiiiiding....
...This is so stupid.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Heh, hahahaha, ahaha, ahah!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Aha, ahahaha, hahahaha!"

name: ミンク
message: "...Are you that messed up already?"
Everything keeps getting weirder and weirder. My head hurts. What's going on?
I laugh hysterically as Mink drags me along.

name: 女性客Ａ
message: "Oh no, is that kid okay? He's totally wasted!"

name: 女性客Ａ
message: "I don't think I've seen you around here! Let's have some fun!"

name: ミンク
message: "Move."

name: 女性客Ａ
message: "Eek!"
He swats the persistent woman away and keeps moving.
But just as we make it to the door, Mink is forced to stop.
Why? Because I've tripped and just about fallen over.

name: ミンク
message: "What are you doing?"
Mink tightens his grip around me.
Something about that seems funny to me, so I throw my arms around his neck.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hehehehe, hehe, ahah!"
He grabs me by the shoulders and tries to pry me off him.
In that instant, a peculiar thought sears my brain.
...I want to be destroyed.

I want him to destroy. I want to destroy.
Everything.
I want him to break me.
I moan breathily into Mink's chest.

name: ミンク
message: "Knock it off."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Destroy me."

name: ミンク
message: "...What?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Destroy me. I want you to wreck me."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Break me into pieces, pound me into pulp, grind me into paste... I don't care how."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Right here, right now... Ruin me."

The lights and sounds are beating against me. But it's not enough.

I need to feel something stronger.
Something so intense... that I won't even be able to think anymore.
Mink is silent for a moment, then he abruptly starts walking, dragging me behind him.
